verses.name: Numbers 35:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 35:2
verses.text: Command the children of Israel, that they give unto the Levites of the inheritance of their possession cities to dwell in; and ye shall give also unto the Levites suburbs for the cities round about them.

verses.name: Numbers 35:3
verses.text: And the cities shall they have to dwell in; and the suburbs of them shall be for their cattle, and for their goods, and for all their beasts.
